actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to require that a question regarding United States citizenship be included in questionnaires used in the decennial census.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce, in conducting the decennial census, to include a question as to whether the individual being counted is a United States citizen.

titles.title: A bill to require that a question regarding United States citizenship be included in questionnaires used in the decennial census.
